scripts.start: yarn init -y && yarn add @ptb/animated-transition && yarn add @ptb/eslint-config && yarn add @ptb/gatsby && yarn add @ptb/gatsby-plugin-pug && yarn add @ptb/gatsby-plugin-react-helmet && yarn add @ptb/gatsby-plugin-styletron && yarn add @ptb/git-setup && yarn add @ptb/http-server && yarn add @ptb/prettier-eslint && yarn add @ptb/sort-json && yarn add @ptb/uncssstyle && yarn add react react-dom && for f in node_modules/@ptb/gatsby/patches/*; do patch -p0 < $f; done
